news_header: The Nasdaq-100 Index® celebrates its 40th anniversary, showcasing significant growth and performance in the investment landscape.
news_original_title: Nasdaq-100 Index® Celebrates 40 Years of Innovation
news_text: The Nasdaq-100 Index® is turning 40, having grown to a market cap of over $27 trillion and becoming a key benchmark for trading and investment products. It has outperformed other indices with a 20,000% increase since inception, driven by major tech stocks. The index includes both U.S. and international companies, reflecting a significant portion of the global economy. With daily trading volumes exceeding $620 billion, it remains a vital tool for investors.
